definition: to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement

sentences.english: Who says the headiness diminishes ones the bottle is empty?
sentences.chinese: 谁说酒瓶空了，酒兴就没了？

sentences.english: Days to pay two drums, taking advantage of revelry left Aheng assassin, ran to the sun and the moon Pavilion.
sentences.chinese: 天交二鼓，刺客趁酒兴离开了阿衡，向日月阁奔去。

sentences.english: Granin: Put that thing away. You'll spoil my drink.
sentences.chinese: 把这东西拿开，会坏了我的酒兴的。

definition: capacity for alcohol/ability to hold drink
refined and elegant attitude of mind
to get thoroughly drunk (idiom)/to get plastered
to add to the fun/to liven things up
while in high spirits/feeling upbeat/on an impulse
to have a few drinks/to drink to one's heart's content
to enjoy oneself to the full/to one's heart's content
